xdevcfg_selftest.c File Reference

Detailed Description

Contains diagnostic self-test functions for the XDcfg driver.

 MODIFICATION HISTORY:

 Ver   Who Date     Changes
 ----- --- -------- ---------------------------------------------
 1.00a hvm 02/07/11 First release
 2.02a nm  02/27/13 Fixed CR# 701348.
                    Peripheral test fails with  Running
 		     DcfgSelfTestExample() in SECURE bootmode.

#include "xdevcfg.h"

Functions

int XDcfg_SelfTest (XDcfg *InstancePtr)

Function Documentation

int XDcfg_SelfTest (  XDcfg *  InstancePtr  ) 
 

Run a self-test on the Device Configuration Interface. This test does a control register write and reads back the same value.

Parameters:
InstancePtr is a pointer to the XDcfg instance.
Returns:
  • XST_SUCCESS if self-test was successful.
  • XST_FAILURE if fails.
Note:
None.
